author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
GENERAL

Indian Chamber of Commerce and Industry: Presentation of G.K. Sundaram award Chamber Towers, Avanashi Road, 6 p.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Mission Vidyalaya Post-Matric Institutions: Graduation Day, 10 a.m.

SNS College of Technology: HR Summit, Chanakya Bhavan, 10 a.m.

RVS Technical Campus: Illinois 16, symposium, 9.30 a.m.

Lions Club of Coimbatore Ram Nagar: Advisory committee meeting, 6.30 p.m.

Nehru Arts and Science College: Workshop and literary festival, 9.30 a.m.

Sri Ranganathar Institute of Engineering and Technology: Blood donation camp, Athipalayam campus, 10 a.m.

TIRUPUR

Angel College of Engineering and Technology: Conference on Information, engineering, management and security, South Korea Minister for Higher Education Dong Hwa Kim, chief guest, 10 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
